<<<<<<< HEAD
An excellent new ballad, to the tune of, How unhappy is Phillis in love
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Prirted [sic] for Benjamin Harris ... and are to be sold by Langley Curtis ..., [London] : 1681.
Place of publication from Wing. Verse - "Let Oliver now be forgotten,". A satire on Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of Shaftesbury. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
